alert.note: Alert for Allen; Beauregard; Northern Calcasieu (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Lake Charles (Southeast Texas and Southwest Louisiana)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 26 at 3:49PM CST by NWS Lake Charles
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT EASTERN BEAUREGARD...NORTH CENTRAL CALCASIEU AND SOUTHWESTERN ALLEN PARISHES THROUGH 430 PM CST... At 349 PM CST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Buhler, or near De Quincy, moving northeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to vegetation and outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Reeves, Dry Creek, De Quincy, Ragley, Longville, Buhler, Harmony, Oretta, and Bundick Lake. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
